column4: How do I know for sure that the recommended video drivers are activated? Using "Hardware Drivers" I'm unable to activate the recommended driver (or so it seems). Nvidia accelerated graphics driver (version 173) [Recommended]
why can you not activate it?
that would be my suggestion, most of the time when you activate a restricted driver, you have to restart
the device shows installed (thus why it shows up in lspci)..
